
            <h1 class="postTitle">
                <a id="cb_post_title_url" class="postTitle2 vertical-middle" href="https://www.cnblogs.com/Can-daydayup/p/18971544" title="发布于 2025-07-10 08:00">
    <span role="heading" aria-level="2">一款开源免费、通用的 WPF 主题控件包</span>
    

</a>

            </h1>
            <div class="clear"></div>
            <div class="postBody">
                <div id="cnblogs_post_body" class="blogpost-body blogpost-body-html">
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>前言</span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>今天大姚给大家分享一款开源免费（MIT License）、通用的 WPF 主题控件包：Rubyer WPF。</span></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202507/1336199-20250707203628311-2017763143.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>WPF介绍</span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>WPF是一个强大的桌面应用程序框架，用于构建具有丰富用户界面的 Windows 应用。它提供了灵活的布局、数据绑定、样式和模板、动画效果等功能，让开发者可以创建出吸引人且交互性强的应用程序。</span></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>项目主要功能</span></h2>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li><span>主题支持切换至中英文。</span></li>
<li><span>通过部分参数配置，可以轻松改变整体主题样式，支持主题亮暗模式切换。</span></li>
<li><span>提供多种完善的主题控件如：按钮、表格、日期时间、对话框、列表框等多种主题。</span></li>
</ul>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>支持模板框架</span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><code><span>.NET Framework 4.6、.NET Core 3.1、.NET 6、 .NET 8、.NET 9</span></code><span>。</span></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202507/1336199-20250707203641797-1305967125.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>主题引入项目</span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>在 NuGet 包管理器中搜索&nbsp;<code><span>Rubyer</span></code><span>&nbsp;安装：</span></span></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202507/1336199-20250707203654972-615400217.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>在 WPF 项目的 App.Xaml 中引用:</span></p>
<pre data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span data-cacheurl="" data-remoteid="" data-lazy-bgimg="https://mmbiz.qpic.cn/mmbiz_svg/9M0PhLTmTIfzNFlBn3E31VFsuMvFUurEd0pTAuwK6BwXBztyib3r12sQYd8sIBdyOaj8r36ra0ejUxE0FdLPLictjRJuJybMGg/640?wx_fmt=svg&amp;from=appmsg" data-fail="0"><code><span>&lt;Application.Resources&gt;<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;ResourceDictionary&gt;<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;ResourceDictionary.MergedDictionaries&gt;<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;ResourceDictionary Source="pack://application:,,,/Rubyer;component/Themes/Generic.xaml"<span>&nbsp;/&gt;<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;/ResourceDictionary.MergedDictionaries&gt;<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;/ResourceDictionary&gt;<br><span>&lt;/Application.Resources&gt;<br></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></code></span></pre>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>项目源码运行</span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>设置&nbsp;<code><span>RubyerDemo</span></code><span>&nbsp;为启动项目运行查看效果：</span></span></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202507/1336199-20250707203707883-24394604.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202507/1336199-20250707203712779-1229816733.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>运行效果展示</span></h2>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202507/1336199-20250707203726312-81697337.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>

<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>项目源码地址</span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>更多项目实用功能和特性欢迎前往项目开源地址查看👀，别忘了给项目一个Star支持💖。</span></p>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li><strong>Gitee开源地址：</strong><a href="https://gitee.com/wuyanxin1028/rubyer-wpf" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span>https://gitee.com/wuyanxin1028/rubyer-wpf</span></a></li>
</ul>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>优秀项目和框架精选</span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>该项目已收录到C#/.NET/.NET Core优秀项目和框架精选中，关注优秀项目和框架精选能让你及时了解C#、.NET和.NET Core领域的最新动态和最佳实践，提高开发工作效率和质量。坑已挖，欢迎大家踊跃提交PR推荐或自荐（让优秀的项目和框架不被埋没🤞）。</span></p>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li><strong>GitHub开源地址：</strong><a href="https://github.com/YSGStudyHards/DotNetGuide/blob/main/docs/DotNet/DotNetProjectPicks.md" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span>https://github.com/YSGStudyHards/DotNetGuide/blob/main/docs/DotNet/DotNetProjectPicks.md</span></a></li>
<li><strong>Gitee开源地址：</strong><a href="https://gitee.com/ysgdaydayup/DotNetGuide/blob/main/docs/DotNet/DotNetProjectPicks.md" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span>https://gitee.com/ysgdaydayup/DotNetGuide/blob/main/docs/DotNet/DotNetProjectPicks.md</span></a></li>
</ul>
